content: hopscotch is a quick winter leg warmer pattern written with a choice of striping and plain colour options and worked in the round you and your child can choose from a variety of styles and colour-ways to create your own individual pair hopscotch is a versatile knit your child will want to wear in the chilly playground at school through the colder weather they also make great quick gifts the pattern can easily be modified to upsize to older children teen or even adult sizes the pattern has been tested
